devdoc.details: Bank contract which coordinates asset-related functionality.     CosmosBank manages the minting and burning of tokens which     represent Cosmos based assets, while EthereumBank manages     the locking and unlocking of Ethereum and ERC20 token assets     based on Ethereum.*
devdoc.title: BridgeBank
